scripts.dev: rimraf dev-dist && cross-env DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa:* SW_DEV=true vite dev
scripts.dev-claims: rimraf dev-dist && cross-env DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa:* SW_DEV=true CLAIMS=true SW=true vite dev
scripts.dev-destroy: rimraf dev-dist && cross-env DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa:* SW_DESTROY=true SW_DEV=true vite dev

scripts.run-build: rimraf .svelte-kit && rimraf build && cross-env DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa:* BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true vite build && node ./pwa.js --BASE_URL=/ --SOURCE_MAP=true
